  specialized how well a particular treatment or drug works under carefully controlled scientific testing conditions: The clinical report shows results of almost 95% efficacy for the vaccine.efficacy of Of course, the efficacy of any drug in a study will be different from its actual performance in the population.efficacy trial Efficacy trials determine whether an intervention produces the expected result under ideal circumstances.
